name: Natural Disaster
description:
The cows have had enough, death to the humans!

Made during 2022 MITS IXs GameJam by the team "Downforce". This is our very first computer game, we have never released a game before.  

W, S - WALKING SHIFT - SPRINT F - HITTING P - POOPINGUSE HEADPHONES

GameJam theme: "Everything is a weapon"
